name: JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy
desc: The strategies available for formatting dates when decoding them from JSON.

items.name: case deferredToDate
items.desc: The strategy that uses formatting from the Date structure.

items.name: case iso8601
items.desc: The strategy that formats dates according to the ISO 8601 standard.

items.name: case formatted(DateFormatter)
items.desc: The strategy that defers formatting settings to a supplied date formatter.

items.name: case custom((Decoder) -> Date)
items.desc: The strategy that formats custom dates by calling a user-defined function.

items.name: case millisecondsSince1970
items.desc: The strategy that decodes dates in terms of milliseconds since midnight UTC on January 1st, 1970.

items.name: case secondsSince1970
items.desc: The strategy that decodes dates in terms of seconds since midnight UTC on January 1st, 1970.
